sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing an Ace of Spades from a standard deck of 52 playing cards?
message_2: The probability of drawing an Ace of Spades from a standard deck of 52 playing cards is 1/52, since there is only one Ace of Spades in the deck and 52 cards in total.
